Immerse yourself in stylized cartoon world in which visual and graphical level reaches new heights. Hordes of un- dead enemies can be stopped only by a determination of Yaiba, who will do everything possible to do the work. Will he kill , making cyber hand into electric chainsaw or off the limbs of their opponents , turning them into zombie weapons of destruction depends on you .

The spectacular , highly stylized graphics, sends players in their own comic book adventure.
Find out more about the mysterious background of Yaiba through many movies recreated thanks to the traditional Japanese "sumi-e" style of painting .
For the first time Team Ninja and Comcept work together on a new title.
